name.baseName: Lithium Concentrate Production ; Lithium Spodumene Concentrate (6% Li2O) ; Crushing ; Western Australia Lithium Spodumene Ore (0.8%-0.9% Li2O)
锂精矿生产 ; 锂辉石精矿（氧化锂含量5%） ; 粉碎 ; 西澳锂辉石矿（氧化锂含量0.8%-0.9%）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Lithium is abundant in several different ore structures throughout the world. Spodumene ore is abundant in western Australia and has been a longtime global source of lithium. Spodumene (LiAlSi2O6) contains up to 8% Li2O (by mass) and can be refined to obtain lithium chemicals such as Li2CO3 or LiOH•H2O. We examined the production of concentrated spodumene from lithium-containing ores in western Australia and its conversion into Li2CO3 or LiOH•H2O in China.
锂在世界各地的几种不同矿石结构中含量丰富。澳大利亚西部盛产钠长石矿，长期以来一直是全球锂的来源。正长岩（LiAlSi2O6）含有高达 8%的 Li2O（按质量计），可通过提炼获得锂化学品，如 Li2CO3 或 LiOH-H2O。我们考察了澳大利亚西部从含锂矿石中提炼出的浓缩闪长岩，以及在中国将其转化为 Li2CO3 或 LiOH-H2O 的情况。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: We developed an LCI data set for lithium ore mining and processing parameters in western Australia. Site assumptions included the need to mine 14 million tonnes of material annually with an annual yield of 2 million tonnes of ore, which we assumed contained 0.8%-0.9% Li2O. The primary operations of the mining site would be excavating and moving materials with diesel trucks. We estimated diesel consumption by these trucks on the basis of continuous operation of 10 trucks. An estimated 1 million m3 of water would be consumed annually, some of which may be discharged to a water system. We assumed that the mined spodumene would be concentrated in a facility designed to have an independent electricity plant operating on diesel fuel. The plant would receive the ore and concentrate it through a series of size reduction, separation, and purification operations, which would consume reagents in relatively low quantities as well as water. The facility will produce concentrated spodumene ore. We assume that the concentrated spodumene has a minimum of 63% pure spodumene with a remaining mass of quartz and feldspar. This yields a minimum ~5% concentration of Li2O by mass for the delivered spodumene ore. Table 4 presents our assumed material and energy inputs to mine and produce concentrated spodumene from western Australia mines.

我们为澳大利亚西部的锂矿开采和加工参数开发了一套 LCI 数据集。现场假设包括每年需要开采 1400 万吨材料，年产量为 200 万吨矿石，我们假设矿石中含有 0.8%-0.9% 的氧化锂。采矿场的主要作业是使用柴油卡车挖掘和运输材料。我们按 10 辆卡车连续作业估算了这些卡车的柴油消耗量。据估计，每年将消耗 100 万立方米的水，其中部分水可能会排放到水系统中。我们假定，开采出的鳞片矿将被浓缩在一个设施中，该设施设计有一个使用柴油的独立发电厂。该工厂将接收矿石，并通过一系列减小粒度、分离和提纯操作将其浓缩，这些操作将消耗相对较少的试剂和水。该设施将生产精矿。我们假定，精矿中的纯度至少为 63%，其余部分为石英和长石。因此，按质量计算，所交付的钠长石矿石中至少含有 ~5% 的 Li2O。表 4 列出了从澳大利亚西部矿山开采和生产精矿所需的假定材料和能源投入。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The lithium spodumene concentrate produced from this process with a lithium oxide (Li2O) content of 6% is intended for use in various applications within the lithium battery manufacturing industry. This high-grade concentrate is typically used as a primary feedstock for the production of lithium compounds that are essential components in the manufacture of rechargeable lithium-ion batteries, ceramics, glass, and other industrial products necessitating high-purity lithium.
该工艺生产的含6%氧化锂（Li2O）的锂辉石精矿，主要用于锂电池制造行业的各种应用。这种高品位精矿通常作为生产锂化合物的主要原料，这些锂化合物是可充电锂离子电池、陶瓷、玻璃及其他需要高纯度锂的工业产品制造中的关键组成部分。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for life cycle assessment, it is important to note that the production processes for the raw materials and the associated energy flows that contribute less than 1% to the overall process have been excluded. Users should incorporate this dataset in the context of the complete life cycle of lithium-ion battery production, taking care to include appropriate system boundaries that account for all relevant upstream and downstream processes, including extraction, purification, and ultimately battery manufacture. Attention should also be paid to the geographic specificity of the dataset, as it pertains to lithium spodumene ore sourced from Western Australia.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，需注意原材料的生产流程和占总过程小于1%的相关能源流已被排除在外。用户在将此数据集置于锂离子电池生产的完整生命周期背景下使用时，应确保包括合适的系统边界，考虑所有相关的上游和下游过程，包括提取、提纯及最终电池制造。同样需要关注数据集的地理特定性，因为它与源自西澳洲的锂辉石矿石相关。
